TopicTitle: How to get multiple docking clamps to dock at the same time

Articles.Content:
In testing a ship which had four senior clampatrons. I lined them all up, in space and only one actually docked, the other three just weren't sticking. How do I get a square of docking clamps to actually clamp at the same time?

I tried warping and I tried going to the space center and back into it but it didn't work
Here's a previous discussion on this topic. Link
